wikipedia_page.main: Philip John Chard (born 16 October 1960) is an English former footballer who made nearly 500 appearances in the Football League between 1978 and 1994, which included nearly 300 for Northampton Town, a club of which he was player-manager in the early 1990s.

response: 12 December 1993 – Northampton Town, who are bottom of Division Three, dismiss manager Phil Chard and replace him with John Barnwell.
